body.name: TopMate Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Ultra Slim Combo, 2.4G Silent Compact USB 2400DPI Mouse and Scissor Switch Keyboard Set with Cover,2 AA & 2 AAA Batteries,for PC/Laptop/Windows-Rose Gold White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Stable 2.4G Wireless Connection】Powerful and reliable connection of wireless keyboard mouse is up to 10 m(393.7in). Wireless keyboard with mouse combo share a Nano receiver (stored at the bottom of the mouse) without installing any additional software, plug and play. Keep your desk clean and tidy.

【Efficient Desktop Keyboard Wireless + Wide Compatibility】The wireless computer keyboard preserving the keys of the numeric keypad, the full-size keyboard has 12 function keys allows you to quickly access the music/volume/mail, etc(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System). The keyboard mouse combo wireless is compatible with Windows XP / ME/ Vista / 7 / 8 /10 / 11 operating systems. Work well with devices which has USB slot like PC, Laptop, Macbook, desktop, Chrome-book, Smart TV.

【Silent Keyboard and 5 DPI Mouse】The wireless office keyboard’ s scissor switch keys provide less noise. Light and responsive tactile keystroke makes typing soft and comfortable. Silent cordless mouse has 5 DPI levels (800/1200/1600/2000/2400). It is fast and precise, keep quiet while maintaining sensitivity. Never worry about disturbing others to rest while working or playing.

【Ultra-Slim and Portable Design】Wireless pc keyboard has 14.55x5.5x0.8in(37*14*2cm), 0.8in(2cm) ultra-thin ABS plastic body, which can save space and easy to carry. Kit keyboard and mouse wireless’s sleek design is super match with office desk. Perfect for business travel, office, home, library and many public occasions.

【Battery Included + Keyboard Cover】 Long-lasting basic AA and AAA batteries are included in the wireless keyboard and mice combo, battery life between 3 and 5 months(varies by usage conditions). The included cover can protect your wireless office keyboard from dust and liquid. 2-Year Warranty: If quality problem with wireless keyboard & mouse set occur within one year, we will replace the new one to you for free.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 515 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is quiet when I type on it, the color is really cool and it's a bit smaller than most, which I also really like. The mouse is smooth and quick to respond and fits nice in my hand. Overall, I would buy another if I needed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Setup and Perfect Color!
reviews.reviewText: My husband ordered this wireless keyboard for my computer, which perfectly matches the rose gold decor in my office. The keys are not noisy. I kept the silicone cover over the keys to keep it dust-free. It also picks up the Wi-Fi, and I've had no issues with the keyboard not working. If you want a wireless keyboard to match your rose-gold decor, this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play! One dongle operates both keyboard and mouse!Added the batteries, plugged in the USB dongle, turned the switch to on (located on backside of mouse) and it immediately worked! Only thing I had to do was change my mouse speed.I've been using it for several hours now and haven't had any issues. Crossing my fingers that it continues to work well.I love that it comes with a keyboard cover. It doesn't hinder the typing and it makes it super quiet.Loving it so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The right size
reviews.reviewText: It was very pretty and the right size. Mine came in with two keys broken. Got it sent back with only minor irritations and ordered a new one that came in promptly. Now I'm all set and loving the new one and getting work done even if I don't want to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard and mouse combo is stylish, lightweight, and super portable. I'm very pleased with how fast it connects to my MacBook. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mouse and keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I got these to change my desk up at work a little bit. Love the keyboard and mouse. The mouse does click quietly!! The only thing is the keys on the keyboard are a little different than I’m used to, but I’ll get used to it soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect!! Keys are quiet as well as mouse clicks. Key cover came with it and was great. I loved the color options and so glad I went with rose and black, it’s the colors I was hoping for!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard is very flat and it effects the performance.
reviews.reviewText: I tried this with and without the dust shield but the keys are so flat you hit the adjacent key when typing. The board has no adjustments to improve the angle & height so that doesn't help either. Ultimately after trying for months to make it work it is being donated to the local charity. I thought this would be a great replacement for the other keyboard that I had for 8 years but it is not for me.
